description:
Experience the charm and simplicity of the iconic Piper Cub J3C-65 in Microsoft Flight Simulator! This legendary aircraft, known for its lightweight design and excellent low-speed handling, is perfect for both novice and experienced pilots. With its classic yellow paint, tandem seating, and a 65 horsepower Continental engine, the J3C-65 offers a nostalgic flight experience.
